description:
Seiya and his friends head to Geist`s island hideout to take back the Golden Helmet, but one threat after another awaits them on the island.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Life or Death! Battle on Devil`s Isle
Sei ka Shi ka! Makaitou no Kessen
¡¿La vida o la muerte?! Combate decisivo en la Isla Diabólica
生か死か! 魔界島の血戦
